participant_1.background:
I love listening to the Beatles while I work on my dog's training.
I bought myself a new outfit to look nice and attract a potential partner.
she likes to grow plants in her garden.
My cat and I are both deaf, but we still have a great time together.
My passion for helping couples create the perfect wedding day will not let me give up hope even in the most difficult of situations.

participant_2.background:
I like to look my best even when I'm at work.
I spend my days drawing, painting and making games that help animals in need.
I love listening to Tool while I'm working on my stamp collection and taking care of my dogs.
I'm happy to have a beautiful home and get to share my passion for gaming with others.
i am 21 years old.

content.text: Hello!
Hi there, how are you doing today?
I'm doing great! I just bought myself a new outfit to look nice and attract a potential partner. What about you?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking! I spent my day drawing, painting, and making games that help animals in need.
That sounds like a fun way to spend the day! I love animals, so that's really cool.
Thanks! I'm glad you like it. I'm also really passionate about helping people, so that's why I make games that help animals in need.
That's so great! I love that you use your passion to help others.
Thanks! I'm glad you think so.
What kind of games do you make?
I make all kinds of games, but my favorite type to make are puzzle games.
Puzzle games are so much fun! I love them.
Thanks! I'm glad you like them.
Do you have any pets?
Yes, I have two dogs. They're my best friends.
That's so sweet! I love dogs.
Thanks! Me too.
I have a cat, but she's deaf.
That's so cool! I've never met a deaf cat before.
Yeah, she's pretty special.
I bet she is.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to draw, paint, make games, play games, and take care of my dogs.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to do a lot of the same things.
That's great! We should be friends.
I'd love that!
